snippet: Hundreds of Polish trade union members chained together barriers meant to keep them out of Parliament on Friday, locking lawmakers in for more than an hour.
lead_paragraph: Hundreds of Polish trade union members chained together barriers meant to keep them out of Parliament on Friday, locking lawmakers in for more than an hour.

headline.main: Poland: Unionists Protest New Retirement Age
headline.print_headline: Poland: Unionists Protest New Retirement Age
